text: Jones and His New Neighbors is a 1909 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithJONES AND HIS NEW NEIGHBORSBernard A. Drew. Motion Picture Series and Sequels: A Reference Guide and stars John R. Cumpson, Florence Lawrence, and Anita Hendrie. ==Actors== * John R. Cumpson as Mr. Eddie Jones * Florence Lawrence as Mrs. Emma Jones * Anita Hendrie as neighbor * Mack Sennett as police officer * Gertrude Robinson as the maid * Owen Moore as extra in crowd * Linda Arvidson as extra in crowd * Anita Hendrie as extra in crowd * Charles Avery as extra in crowd * David Miles as extra in crowd * Flora Finch as extra in crowd * Charles Inslee as extra in crowd ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 movies Category:1900s comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Jones and His New Neighbors
